30 #include <list>
31 #include <sstream>
32 #include <string>
33 #include "Clock.h"
34 #include "Thread.h"
35 #include "SKLogger.hxx"
36 #include "UnorderedMap.h"

38 namespace DepthSense {
39 
40  namespace Utils {
41 
42  template <class T> class TimeWatch
43  {
44  public:
45  struct BenchData {
46  BenchData()
47  {
48  startTime = 0;
49  cumulatedTime = 0;
50  count = 0;
51  }
52  int64_t startTime;
53  int64_t cumulatedTime;
54  int count;
55  };
56  static TimeWatch<T>* instance(unsigned long id, const char* classname, const char* func, T* parent)
57  {
58  std::ostringstream os;
59  os << "[" << id << "]" << classname << "::" << func << "(" << parent << ")";
60  std::string str = os.str();
61  typename std::unordered_map<std::string, TimeWatch<T>*>::const_iterator it;
62  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lock(_mutex);
63  if (_map == NULL)
64  {
65  _map = new std::unordered_map<std::string, DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch<T>*>;
66  }
67  it = _map->find(str);
68  if (it == _map->end())
69  {
70  TimeWatch<T>* tw = new TimeWatch<T>(parent);
71  (*_map)[str] = tw;
72  return tw;
73  }
74  return it->second;
75  }
76  TimeWatch(T* parent)
77  {
78  _parent = parent;
79  DepthSense::Utils::Clock::getTime(_startTime);
80  _lastTime = _startTime;
81  _count = 0;
82  _benchTime = 0;
83  }
84  T* parent() const
85  {
86  return _parent;
87  }
88  int count() const
89  {
90  return _count;
91  }
92  bool threshold(int value)
93  {
94  return ((++_count % value) == 0);
95  }
96  double freq()
97  {
98  DepthSense::Utils::Clock::getTime(_lastTime);
99  if (_lastTime == _startTime)
100  {
101  return -1.0;
102  }
103  return (double)(_count)*1.0e6/(double)(_lastTime - _startTime);
104  }
105  int benchStart(int line)
106  {
107  typename std::unordered_map<int, BenchData*>::const_iterator it;
108  it = _benchDataMap.find(line);
109  BenchData* data;
110  if (it == _benchDataMap.end())
111  {
112  data = new BenchData();
113  _benchDataMap[line] = data;
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  data = it->second;
118  }
119  _benchStartLines.push_back(line);
120  DepthSense::Utils::Clock::getTime(data->startTime);
121  return line;
122  }
123  int benchStop(int threshold)
124  {
125  int64_t benchStopTime;
126  DepthSense::Utils::Clock::getTime(benchStopTime);
127  if (_benchStartLines.empty())
128  {
129  return -1;
130  }
131  int line = _benchStartLines.back();
132  _benchStartLines.pop_back();
133  typename std::unordered_map<int, BenchData*>::const_iterator it;
134  it = _benchDataMap.find(line);
135  if (it == _benchDataMap.end())
136  {
137  return -1;
138  }
139  BenchData* data = it->second;
140  data->cumulatedTime += (benchStopTime - data->startTime);
141  if (++data->count == threshold)
142  {
143  _benchTime = (int64_t)((double)(data->cumulatedTime)/(double)(data->count));
144  data->count = 0;
145  data->cumulatedTime = 0;
146  return line;
147  }
148  return -1;
149  }
150  int64_t benchTime() const
151  {
152  return _benchTime;
153  }
154  private:
155  T* _parent;
156  int64_t _startTime;
157  int64_t _lastTime;
158  int _count;
159  std::unordered_map<int, BenchData*> _benchDataMap;
160  int64_t _benchTime;
161  std::list<int> _benchStartLines;
162  static DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Mutex _mutex;
163  static std::unordered_map<std::string, TimeWatch<T>*>* _map;
164  };
165  }
166 }
167 
168 template<class T>
169 std::unordered_map<std::string, DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch<T>*>* DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch<T>::_map = NULL;
170 
171 template<class T>
172 DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Mutex DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch<T>::_mutex;
173 
174 #define TIMEWATCH_CALL_FREQUENCY(__classname, __threshold) \
175 do \
176 { \
177  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >* timeWatch = \
178  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >::instance \
179  (DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread::getCurrentThreadId(), #__classname, __FUNCTION__, this); \
180  if (timeWatch->threshold(__threshold)) \
181  { \
182  INFO("%(%): %: FREQUENCY = % calls/sec", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, this, timeWatch->freq()); \
183  } \
184 } while (0)
185 
186 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_START(__classname) \
187 do \
188 { \
189  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >* timeWatch = \
190  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >::instance \
191  (DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread::getCurrentThreadId(), #__classname, __FUNCTION__, this); \
192  (void) timeWatch->benchStart(__LINE__); \
193 } while (0)
194 
195 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_STOP(__classname, __threshold) \
196 do \
197 { \
198  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >* timeWatch = \
199  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >::instance \
200  (DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread::getCurrentThreadId(), #__classname, __FUNCTION__, this); \
201  int line = timeWatch->benchStop(__threshold); \
202  if (line >= 0) \
203  { \
204  INFO("%(%-%): %: BENCH TIME = % usec", __FUNCTION__, line, __LINE__, this, timeWatch->benchTime()); \
205  } \
206 } while (0)
207 
208 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_STOP_MSG(__classname, __threshold, __msg) \
209 do \
210 { \
211  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >* timeWatch = \
212  DepthSense::Utils::TimeWatch< __classname >::instance \
213  (DepthSense::Utils::Threading::Thread::getCurrentThreadId(), #__classname, __FUNCTION__, this); \
214  int line = timeWatch->benchStop(__threshold); \
215  if (line >= 0) \
216  { \
217  INFO("%(%-%): %:% BENCH TIME = % usec", __FUNCTION__, line, __LINE__, this, __msg, timeWatch->benchTime()); \
218  } \
219 } while (0)
220 
221 #else /* !DEPTHSENSE_TIMEWATCH */
222 
223 
224 #define TIMEWATCH_CALL_FREQUENCY(__classname, __threshold) do {} while (0)
225 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_START(__classname) do {} while (0)
226 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_STOP(__classname, __threshold) do {} while (0)
227 #define TIMEWATCH_BENCH_STOP_MSG(__classname, __threshold, __msg) do {} while (0)
228 
229 
230 #endif /* DEPTHSENSE_TIMEWATCH */
231 
232 #endif /* TIMEWATCH_HXX */
